Construct an iterator.

@1@ Move constructor. Move-initializes the underlying pointer {{rlpi|/#Data members|parent_}} with {{box|{{c/core|other.}}{{tti|parent_}}}}.

@2@ A private constructor which is used by {{ltt|cpp/ranges/chunk_view/begin|chunk_view::begin}}. This constructor is not accessible to users. Initializes {{rlpi|/#Data members|parent_}} with {{c|std::addressof(parent)}}.
